=head1 NAME

DiaColloDB::Upgrade::v0_09_multimap - DiaColloDB utilities: auto-magic upgrade: v0.09.x: MultiMapFile format

=cut

##========================================================================
## SYNOPSIS
=pod

=head1 SYNOPSIS

 ##========================================================================
 ## PRELIMINARIES
 
 use DiaColloDB::Upgrade::v0_09_multimap;
 
 ##========================================================================
 ## API
 
 $version = $up->toversion();
 $bool    = $up->upgrade();
 
 ##========================================================================
 ## Backups & Rollback
 
 $bool  = $up->backup();
 @files = $up->revert_created();
 @files = $up->revert_updated();
 

=cut

##========================================================================
## DESCRIPTION
=pod

=head1 DESCRIPTION

DiaColloDB::Upgrade::v0_09_multimap
provides a L<DiaColloDB::Upgrade|DiaColloDB::Upgrade>-compliant
package for upgrading a
L<DiaColloDB|DiaColloDB> database directory in-place.

Upgrade actions performed:

=over 4

=item *

updates MultiMapFile formats from v0.08.x to v0.09.x

=back


=cut

##----------------------------------------------------------------
## DESCRIPTION: DiaColloDB::Upgrade::v0_09_multimap: API
=pod

=head2 API

=over 4

=item toversion

 $version = $CLASS_OR_OBJECT->toversion();

Returns default target version;
here C<"0.09.000">.

=item upgrade

 $bool = $up->upgrade();

Performs upgrade in-place on the local L<DiaColloDB|DiaColloDB> index in C<$up-E<gt>{dbdir}>, returns true on success.

=back

=cut

##----------------------------------------------------------------
## DESCRIPTION: DiaColloDB::Upgrade::v0_04_dlimits: Backups & Rollback
=pod

=head2 Backups & Rollback

=over 4

=item backup

 $bool = $up->backup();

Backup any files we expect to change during L<upgrade|/upgrade>() to C<$up-E<gt>L<backupdir|DiaColloDB::Upgrade::Base/backupdir>()>.

=item revert_created

 @files = $up->revert_created();

Returns list of files created by this upgrade, for use with default L<DiaColloDB::Upgrade::Base::revert|DiaColloDB::Upgrade::Base/revert>().

=item revert_updated

 @files = $up->revert_updated();

Returns list of files updated by this upgrade, for use with default L<DiaColloDB::Upgrade::Base::revert|DiaColloDB::Upgrade::Base/revert>().

=back

=cut
